game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: Your mission is to penetrate the fortress of the enemy, overcome their guards, and retrieve the ancient artifact that has been lost for centuries.

task.description: To gain entry, search for the hidden entrance in the Enchanted Forest.
Prepare yourself for a fierce battle at the Fortress Gates.
The artifact is said to be in a secret room deep within. Complete this challenge at the Fortress Dungeon.
